description:
Izayoi Arisa is a member of the Tsukiyono Company, a mercenary agency consisting of bunny girls willing to take on any assignment.
She is http://anidb.net/ch120646 [Kitagawa Marin]`s favourite character in the We are the Tsukiyono Company (Kochira Tsukiyono Company こちら月夜野♡カンパニ〜) television show to which http://anidb.net/ch120645 [Gojou Wakana] was introduced.
name: Izayoi Arisa
